li.datasource

类 ConnectionWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • li.datasource.ConnectionWrapper
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.sql.Connection, java.sql.Wrapper

    public class ConnectionWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.sql.Connection
    ConnectionWrapper
    作者:
    : li (limingwei@mail.com)
